Description:
In the southern temple you see an ancient altar that still seems to have some energy, also you hear a soft tone emanating from it.

Before making an offering you look around and see a few sirens in the water watching you.

Everything makes you think that the sirens use this altar and that it reacts to the sound of their voice.
DescriptionAction: Do you want to make an offering?
